internship.title: Summer Internship Program by CodeTantra
details: The main objective is to provide basic knowledge of Python. Python programming language is intended for engineers, system analysis, program managers and user support personal who wish to learn the Python programming.
Understanding of the fundamental concepts of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), including classes, objects, inheritance, encapsulation, and polymorphism.

Learning to work collaboratively on OOP-based projects is crucial. The project emphasizes skills in version control, code integration, and effective communication within a team to collectively develop OOP-driven solutions.

projects.name: Book Management System
description: It simulates a basic book management system, allowing users to perform common library actions in an interactive manner.
Users can register in this system.
Users can also borrow and return the books.

projects.name: Calendar Events
description: CLI implementation of an application Calendar events which allows users to create, read, update and delete new events in the calendar and reminds users when the events arrive.

certificates.name: Excel Skills for Data Analytics and Visualization
